channel.title: frankm tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from frankm.

item.description: Qualcomm’s announcement of their new smartwatch chips makes the Google WearOS market more confusing, in my opinion. The problem with WearOS is that there is no real flagship watch that you know is the latest and greatest reflecting how Google thinks ... https://t.co/UvDV7Nong5
item.source:markdown: Qualcomm’s announcement of their new smartwatch chips makes the Google WearOS market more confusing, in my opinion. The problem with WearOS is that there is no real flagship watch that you know is the latest and greatest reflecting how Google thinks ... https://t.co/UvDV7Nong5

item.description: Tried using Gluon on my Pixel 4a to upload that photo, but it wouldn’t load the dialog to select photos. Used the official https://t.co/IqhT6AfwpO app instead. Nice to have options.
item.source:markdown: Tried using Gluon on my Pixel 4a to upload that photo, but it wouldn’t load the dialog to select photos. Used the official https://t.co/IqhT6AfwpO app instead. Nice to have options.

item.description: Google reminded me about the last concert we attended before the Pandemic, on this date in 2019. The arena sent me an email a few days before about discounted tickets, otherwise we would not have went, but so glad that we did. https://t.co/wMnVdtlsKP
item.source:markdown: Google reminded me about the last concert we attended before the Pandemic, on this date in 2019. The arena sent me an email a few days before about discounted tickets, otherwise we would not have went, but so glad that we did. https://t.co/wMnVdtlsKP

item.description:
How it began, but we don’t want to face history thus appear destined to repeat it.

“In 1544, Sepulveda wrote a manuscript justifying the wars against the Amerindians, based largely on what he saw as their inferiority. In it, his thinking is strictly ... https://t.co/k6BdtMmYNe

item.description: YouTube advertising is becoming more obnoxious by the minute. Starting to wonder about whether there are better alternatives. Google is close to jumping the shark.
item.source:markdown: YouTube advertising is becoming more obnoxious by the minute. Starting to wonder about whether there are better alternatives. Google is close to jumping the shark.
